page.title: 14The Public Houses
page.content: There are three licensed public houses, all offer a variety of meals. The Lamb is the largest and at this time,the most popular; attracting a varied custom including many of the "old" villagers; as opposed to "newcomers". The Red Lion is lively but about to suffer a change of landlord. The Crown is seldom as busy as the other two. All the pubs run dart teams, house a "one armed bandit" and play recorded music; in short they are similar in what they have to offer. The start of competition in the form of The Wallace Club, which offers cheap drinks and more floor space is an interesting development. Prices:Pubs Bitter 84p/pint Club Bitter 68p/pint
